question: I wish a senior diabetist can tell me how to take diabetes medication!Metformin is not working and I'm unable to torelate it. (SOB)  MiniDiab is working well for me but it acts like a roller coaster.  If I didn't take it, it shoots up like 18.  If I take it, it can drop to 3.4.  I only told to take 2.5mg twice a day.  Then I need some sweets to cover.  If I don't take it then I don't need sweets to cover.  So one of my friend told me have to take it regulary.  Then do I have to buy some more sweets to take with it regulary?  Why people said diabetes cannot take sweets?  Very, very confuse!
title: Take Diabetes Med method
